channel.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server
channel.description:
ok i had this problem and lots of ppl are complaingi about it. If this error appears to u do the following:
1. go to www.java.com
2. download the java (even if u have it!)
3. instal it and it will work!
WHY DO I HAVE TO DO THIS? java has a new update and that update will let u play moparscape

item.title: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server
item.dc:creator: @RS_CHamp2 RS CHamp2
item.description:
@RS_CHamp2 wrote:

Hi,
It might be, that you did something wrong whilst compiling your server. That means, your server.java aint working right mate. Use another source or compile again. Use a easy source and modify that highly is my recomendation, or wait until the new hybridscape 345 or something comes out.

Read full topic
